newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan money rates high in cash-short market.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan money rates high in cash-short market.

text.p: Pakistan's interbank money market rates remained at high levels on Wednesday amid a shortage of funds, dealers said.
One dealer said the liquidity squeeze had not deterred the State (central) Bank of Pakistan from conducting its weekly open market operation, but no details were available.

Rumours that seven billion rupees had been discounted on Tuesday prompted banks to borrow overnight funds at 20 percent, the dealer said. "All trades were struck at this level with no questions asked," he added.
